metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 7 (1997) - Workshop on Conceptual/Theoretical Studies and Model Development including the MODEL Task Team report / edited by R. Ian Perry, Sinjae Yoo and Makoto Terazaki. BASS Task Team report / edited by Richard J. Bea...
metadata.description:
Report includes the texts of the invited state-of-the-art overviews of atmosphere-ocean modeling, lower trophic level models, upper trophic level models, and model integration and management issues.  Also includes a report of MODEL Task Team meetings at the end of the workshop and just prior to the fifth Annual PICES meeting, in which the workshop results are distilled into a plan for action regarding the Climate Change and Carrying Capacity (CCCC) modeling activities.  Summaries of the Japan-GLOBEC symposium and reports of national GLOBEC activities in member nations are included as appendices.

   [ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.7.  ISBN 0969842074 ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Workshop was convened by the MODEL Task Team and held June 23-28, 1996, in Nemuro, Japan, to develop the modeling requirements of the PCIES Climate Change and Carrying Capacity (CCCC) Program.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
